h2. Settings

{{html:
<hr>
<form class="form-horizontal" ng-controller="SettingsController" ng-app="myApp">
<fieldset>

<!-- Form Name -->

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">Name</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="Name" class="input-xlarge" ng-model="settings.name">
    
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">E-mail</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="email" placeholder="Email" class="input-xlarge" ng-model="settings.email"
      patterm="^[a-zA-Z0-9.!#$%&'*+/=?^_`{|}~-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9-]+(?:\.[a-zA-Z0-9-]+)+$" >
    
  </div>
</div>
<hr>
<!-- Password input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="passwordinput">Password</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="passwordinput" name="passwordinput" type="password" placeholder="xxxxxxx" class="input-xlarge" ng-model="password">
    
  </div>
</div>
<hr>
<!-- Multiple Radios (inline) -->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="radios">Credit Card Type</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <label class="radio inline" for="radios-3">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-3" value="Paypal" ng-model="ccType">
      Diners
    </label>
    <label class="radio inline" for="radios-0">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-0" value="Visa (Coming Soon)"  ng-model="ccType">
      Visa
    </label>
    <label class="radio inline" for="radios-1">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-1" value="Mastercard (Coming Soon)" ng-model="ccType">
      Mastercard
    </label>
    <label class="radio inline" for="radios-2">
      <input type="radio" name="radios" id="radios-2" value="American Express (Coming Soon)" ng-model="ccType">
      American Express
    </label>
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">Credit Card Number</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <!-- Pattern taken from http://www.regular-expressions.info/creditcard.html -->
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-x765" class="input-xlarge" ng-model="ccNum"
      pattern="^(?:4[0-9]{12}(?:[0-9]{3})?|5[1-5][0-9]{14}|6(?:011|5[0-9][0-9])[0-9]{12}|3[47][0-9]{13}|3(?:0[0-5]|[68][0-9])[0-9]{11}|(?:2131|1800|35\d{3})\d{11})$">
    
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">Expiration date</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="dd/mm" class="input-mini" ng-model="ccExpiration"
      pattern="^\d{2}/\d{2}">
    
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Text input-->
<div class="control-group">
  <label class="control-label" for="textinput">CCV</label>
  <div class="controls">
    <input id="textinput" name="textinput" type="text" placeholder="" class="input-mini" ng-model="ccv" pattern="\d{3,4}"> <span class="note"> 3 or 4 digits on the backside </span>

  </div>
</div>

<!-- Button -->
<div class="form-actions">
<button id="singlebutton" name="singlebutton" class="btn btn-info btn-large " ng-click="save()" >Save</button> 
</div>





















</fieldset>
</form>
}}
